sentences.english: He's very tall and · well-built.
sentences.russian: Он очень высокий и · хорошо сложен.

sentences.english: They produce everything · on a small scale.
sentences.russian: Они производят все · в небольших масштабах.

sentences.english: Remember to · back up your files regularly.
sentences.russian: Не забывай регулярно · делать резервные копии файлов.

sentences.english: This is a beautiful · piece of music.
The committee · rejected our suggestion.
This restaurant is · highly recommended.
I love movies with a · happy ending.
sentences.russian: Я люблю фильмы со · счастливым концом.

sentences.english: I'm trying to · break the habit of smoking.
She's a former · world record holder.
The city has many · tall buildings.
I · hold the view that education is important.
sentences.russian: Я · придерживаюсь мнения, что образование важно.

sentences.english: I'm away on a · business trip.
The summer · came to an end.
The company · provides training for staff.
We have no · reason to believe him.
sentences.russian: У нас нет · оснований верить ему.

sentences.english: I almost · lost my balance on the ice.
sentences.russian: Я чуть не · потерял равновесие на льду.

sentences.english: The band has a · huge following.
I met an · old friend yesterday.
These items · fall into different categories.
sentences.russian: Эти предметы · попадают в разные категории.

sentences.english: If you break the rules, you must · suffer the consequences.
sentences.russian: Если нарушаешь правила, должен · нести последствия.

sentences.english: My · short-term memory is getting worse.
She's a · single parent with two kids.
He was · pacing up and down nervously.
She's a very · sensible person.
The court deals with · young offenders.

sentences.russian: У нас был · жаркий спор о политике.

sentences.english: I hope he · becomes successful one day.
We stayed in · budget accommodation.
That was a · wise decision.
I need time to · weigh up the options.
sentences.russian: Мне нужно время, чтобы · взвесить варианты.

sentences.english: I don't want to · take a risk.
I got a · prompt response to my email.
sentences.russian: Я получил · быстрый ответ на свое письмо.

sentences.english: I have · no option but to agree.
sentences.russian: У меня · нет выбора, кроме как согласиться.

sentences.english: He wants to · become famous.

sentences.russian: Мы любим · кататься на лыжах зимой.

sentences.english: I hope you · have a great time.

sentences.russian: Вчера они · играли в футбольный матч.

sentences.english: He · strongly denied the allegations.
